title: Moderate House Democrats Are at Risk, Putting the Majority Up for Grabs
description: Several Democrats elected in 2018 with an anti-Trump message in conservative-leaning districts are centering their closing argument on protecting democracy as they try to buck national trends.
dc:creator: Luke Broadwater
category: House Select Committee to Investigate the January 6th Attack
media:credit: Kristen Zeis for The New York Times
